short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add XML tags to selected text on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform plain text into XML-tagged content instantly with XMLTagger.

This sleek Chrome plugin is a must-have for writers, developers, and data wranglers who need to add structure to their text on the fly.

Whether you're crafting AI prompts, organizing information, or prepping data for processing, XMLTagger streamlines your workflow with surgical precision.

Just highlight your text, click the XMLTagger button, and watch as your words are expertly wrapped in your custom XML tags.
